import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const [qty, serQty] = useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) return ( <> Go Back {loading ? : error ? {error} : (

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value)}> [...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map(x => ( ) )} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
